item.title: DuckDB 1.2: SQL gets even friendlier
item.description: DuckDB 1.2 is here, packed with new features to make SQL even more user-friendly. We’re going to explore these features with help from Jeff Sackmann’s tennis dataset. Let’s launch DuckDB and then create a variable referring to one of the CSV files. I’ve created a video showing how to do this on my YouTube channel, Learn Data with Mark, so if you prefer to consume content through that medium, I’ve embedded it below:
